page.title: 16SPORT AND LEISURE
page.content: {Hockey { }Hockey is a game with long wooden sticks.The aim is to hit the ball in the goal. {Rounders} Rounders involves two teams,one team fields and the other team bats the batting team has to hit the ball and try to run round four posts and the fielders have to stump the posts with the ball or touch the batter with the ball { {Cricket { }Cricket is relatively the same as rounders except you must hit the wickets.Wickets are wooden stumps. {Horse Riding { }Horse Riding is a sport involving animals where you have to get on a saddle which is on the horses back then you hold on to the reigns which is on the bridle.
